[Home](api/index.md) &gt; [@ali/eva.js](api/eva.js.md) &gt; [System](api/eva.js.system.md)

## System class

Each System runs continuously and performs global actions on every Entity that possesses a Component of the same aspect as that System.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
declare class System 
```

## Constructors

|  Constructor | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [(constructor)(params)](api/eva.js.system._constructor_.md) |  | Constructs a new instance of the <code>System</code> class |

|  [game](api/eva.js.system.game.md) |  | Game | Game instance |
|  [name](api/eva.js.system.name.md) |  | string |  |
|  [observerInfo](api/eva.js.system.observerinfo.md) | <code>static</code> | [PureObserverInfo](api/eva.js.pureobserverinfo.md) | The collection of component properties observed by the System. System will respond to these changes |
|  [started](api/eva.js.system.started.md) |  | boolean | Represents the status of the component, if component has started, the value is true |
|  [systemName](api/eva.js.system.systemname.md) | <code>static</code> | string | System name |

|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [awake()?](api/eva.js.system.awake.md) |  | <i>(Optional)</i> Calleen system installed |

|  [onDestroy()?](api/eva.js.system.ondestroy.md) |  | <i>(Optional)</i> Called while the system be destroyed. |
|  [onPause()?](api/eva.js.system.onpause.md) |  | <i>(Optional)</i> Called while the game paused |
|  [onResume()?](api/eva.js.system.onresume.md) |  | <i>(Optional)</i> Called before game runing or every time game paused |
|  [start()?](api/eva.js.system.start.md) |  | <i>(Optional)</i> Called after all system <code>awake</code> method has been called |
|  [update(e)?](api/eva.js.system.update.md) |  | <i>(Optional)</i> Called in each tick |
